name: Connect 10
description:
Connect 10 is a very addictive math puzzle game. You swipe to connect numbers to a total value of 10. Connect as many as possible in limited time.

Tip:
-Long link will give you bonus score.
-Used numbers will decrease in value.

Enjoy!
